results.title: Trump's Radical Ukraine Pivot
creator: RFE/RL staff
results.description: In an abrupt change showing his frustration with Russian President Vladimir Putin, US President Donald Trump said Ukraine could win back all of its territory from Russia with the help of its European allies. Trump has previously said both sides would have to cede land to end the war. Russia currently controls around one-fifth of Ukrainian territory, including the Black Sea peninsula of Crimea, which was illegally annexed in 2014. After a speech at the UN General Assembly where he called on European allies during his address to immediately stop...

results.title: ETO Markets Secures Strategic Investment, Launches Global Restructuring
results.description: SYDNEY, Sept. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- ETO Markets officially announced the completion of a strategic investment from a leading international institution, underscoring the investor's strong confidence in both the industry outlook and ETO Markets' growth potential. The capital infusion is intended to accelerate global expansion and strengthen ETO Markets' international competitiveness. Alongside the investment, ETO Markets is initiating a comprehensive management and strategic realignment to advance its vision and enhance operational efficiency. ETO Markets Secures Strategic Investment Board Director Jonathan described the announcement as a pivotal moment in the company's journey: "This milestone enables us to unlock growth potential through enhanced capital structure and governance, strengthening our leadership in the industry." The investment injects fresh momentum into ETO Markets, with a focus on global expansion, upgrading technical infrastructure, improving the trading environment, and enhancing customer service — all aimed at solidifying long-term competitiveness. At the same time, enhancements to the company's leadership framework, strategic direction, and operational workflows will drive responsiveness, innovation, and global synergy. As ETO Markets marks its 12th anniversary, this initiative signals a new chapter of growth, focused on expanding international presence, advancing fintech innovation, and elevating client experiences to build a more trusted, competitive financial services platform. Jonathan added, "With a global perspective and an innovation-driven approach, we will set higher standards for the industry and deliver long-term value to our clients and partners." Looking ahead, ETO Markets remains committed to driving sustainable growth and shaping the future of global financial services through innovation and excellence. LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/etogroup/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/etomarketsglobal/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/etomarketsglobal/

results.title: The World's First AI-Powered E-Ink Calendar, Coming Soon to Indiegogo
results.description: BEIJING, Sept. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- What should scheduling look like in the age of AI? "Always-on, long battery life, voice interaction, smart analysis, and proactive planning." The team behind Nartick, experts in AI applications and smart hardware development, has given their answer. Nartick AI Calendar The Nartick AI Calendar redefines traditional scheduling by upgrading the calendar into a true personal assistant, introducing the world's first AI-powered E-Ink smart device, launching soon on Indiegogo. The Modern Time Dilemma Our lives are increasingly fragmented. At work, we juggle meetings, projects, and events; at home, we manage shopping, travel, family, and countless daily tasks. Schedules are scattered across different apps, notebooks, and sticky notes, making organization harder, and important tasks easier to forget. Traditional calendar apps require manual input, repeated checking, and lack true convenience or intelligence. In today's AI-driven world, people need more than just "record and remind." They need a time management assistant that can respond instantly, offer proactive planning, and execute tasks automatically. Nartick AI Calendar Redefining the Calendar: 7 Breakthrough Innovations 1. Always-On E-Ink Dashboard Eye-friendly E-Ink display with ultra-low power consumption and up to 2 weeks of battery life. Always-on visibility means your daily agenda is just a glance away. 2. Smart Alerts & Voice Broadcasts Beyond notifications, Nartick can announce schedules via voice. Whether it's a morning briefing before work or a reminder just before your next meeting. 3. Full Voice Interaction Powered by OpenAI GPT-5, simply say: "Schedule a meeting with Tom tomorrow at 3 PM." The calendar updates automatically. Voice-based queries, edits, and deletions make hands-free, natural interaction possible anytime, anywhere. 4. AI Planning & Task Execution Nartick doesn't just remember, it thinks. By analyzing your lifestyle and work patterns, it suggests optimal scheduling. It also gathers real-time info, like weather and traffic, to recommend travel plans. 5. Cross-Platform Calendar Sync Compatible with Google, Outlook, Apple Calendar, CalDav, and URL-based imports. Add once, sync everywhere, keeping all your schedules unified and visible at a glance. 6. Multi-Device Collaboration Backed by years of software development, the system ensures seamless synchronization across phone, computer, and the E-Ink device. Any update appears instantly across all devices. 7. Shared Calendars for Families & Teams More than a personal tool, Nartick enables family shopping lists, team meeting coordination, and streamlined collaboration for everyone. Your Personal Scheduling Assistant - Work Companion: Add meetings by voice on your commute. Nartick auto-sets reminders and broadcasts agendas before start time. - Family Organizer: Parents add study schedules via phone, kids receive reminders directly on the device at home. - Travel Planner: Enter your destination, and AI generates a to-do list: visa, tickets, hotel, packing, and timely reminders. - Task Breakdown Expert: Type "Prepare product launch," and AI splits it into subtasks like writing press releases, designing slides, booking venues, etc. - Health Reminder: Timed announcements to remind seniors to take medication. - Daily Summary: Auto-summarizes the day each evening, highlighting unfinished tasks to help close the loop. - Knowledge Assistant: With GPT-5, it doubles as a conversational hub for news, weather, Q&A, and more. The team explains: "Our goal is to let AI handle memory, scheduling, and information gathering. removing the learning curve and workload of calendar apps, so users can focus on what truly matters and enjoy life." Indiegogo Launch Information This Nartick AI Calendar is expected to officially launch on the Indiegogo platform in late October 2025. Pre-orders are now available, offering backers early bird discounts and limited first-release rewards. The team hopes to explore the infinite possibilities of integrating AI technology with lifestyle together with global users through this crowdfunding campaign. About the Team The Nartick AI Calendar, developed by Aimmee Technology. Aimmee Technology is a multidisciplinary team of experts in hardware design, artificial intelligence, and user experience. The team believes that AI should serve daily life, making technology a natural helper, not a burden. Media Contact & More Information - Indiegogo early bird discount reservation link: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/nartick-e-ink-calendar-ultimate-ai-scheduler--2/coming_soon/x/38737205 - Product Video Link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a_ag471VWBI - Email: bs@nartick.com - Official Website: https://nartick.com
